data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Heppner, John B., Bae, Yang-Seop (2017): Zebraodes, new genus, with a new species from Vietnam (Lepidoptera: Tortricidae: Tortricinae: Archipini).
